trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Brunswick
There were no other sightings in Brunswick on or around July 15th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi went outside around 2100 hrs thursday, 15 july 2010, looking up at the sky, looking at the stars and counting the airplanes as i always do. it was clear and cool (76f). i suddenly noticed a bright star like object moving accross the sky in a easternly direction in a zig zag then continued a straight line. i hollered for both my boys 9 and 10 yrs of age to wittness the sight. i looked at the time on my cell phone to have an idea of what time i saw it. it was 2138hrs when the boys came out and viewed it with me. we watched together for about 1 minute as it then just dissapeared out of our sight due to the tall pines in our yard. i knew it couldn't be a plane with take off \ landing gear lights cause planes don't fly backwards and zig zag high in the sky. it didn't appear to be a star \ commet, cause they always move extremly fast in a straight line.
Summary: Bright star like zig zag once then flew a straight line as high as the other stars in the sky.
